content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle highlights an entrance or exit point at the left-bottom corner of the structure. High stiffness is required in the Z direction to align with the entry, with lower stiffness in the X and Y directions to allow smooth sliding.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 250]
  ]
}
```
